/*
    anick_gemini
*/

#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;
 
int main()

{
    
    int t,num;
    
	char foo[10000];
	
    scanf("%d",&t);
    
	while(t--)
    
	{
        
		int i=0;
		scanf("%s",foo);
        
		while(foo[i]!='\0')
		{
			
            if(foo[i]=='1')
               {
                  num=(foo[i]-48)*100+(foo[i+1]-48)*10 + (foo[i+2]-48);
                  printf("%c",num);
                  i+=3;
               }
            
             else
                {
                   num=(foo[i]-48)*10+(foo[i+1]-48);
                   printf("%c",num);
                   i+=2;   
                }

         }
         
		printf("\n");
        
	}
    
	return 0;
}
